put.summary: Update customer application access and role
Set or update override values for a specific identifier

delete.summary: Delete an override for a specific identifier

post.summary: Create an invite link for a new team member
Regenerate an invite link with a new token

get.summary: Get all applications for current customers's company

post.summary: Create application for current customers's company
Copy overrides from one environment to another

get.summary: List all environments for an application

post.summary: Create a new environment for an application
Regenerate an API key by type and return the new key

get.summary: Retrieve all team members and pending invites for the assigned company
Retrieve pricing statistics for all applications and environments in the company
List templates for an application, optionally filtered by type

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by template type (USER or SYSTEM). If not provided, returns all templates.

get.summary: Get merged values for a template (defaults + identifier overrides)

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: Identifiers to merge, in order of precedence

get.summary: List all overrides for a template in an environment
List all overrides for an application and environment, grouped by template type
Get daily usage statistics for an environment
Get an API key by type for an application and environment

BooleanTemplateField.description: A boolean field with no additional constraints

EnumTemplateField.description: An enum field with a list of allowed options

FieldType.description: Field type, always ENUM for this schema

NumberTemplateField.description: A numeric field with range and increment constraints

StringTemplateField.description: A string field with length constraints

applicationIds.description: Application IDs to grant access to

items.description: Application IDs to grant access to

inviteToken.description: Invite token for joining an existing company

sourceEnvironmentId.description: Source environment ID to copy from

targetEnvironmentId.description: Target environment ID to copy to

types.description: Template types to copy (USER, SYSTEM, or both). If not provided, copies all types.

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite existing overrides in the target environment. Default: false

identifiers.description: Optional list of specific identifiers to copy. If not provided, copies all identifiers.

items.description: Optional list of specific identifiers to copy. If not provided, copies all identifiers.

skippedCount.description: Number of overrides skipped (already existed and overwrite=false)

totalRequests.description: Total number of requests for this day

peakRequestsPerSecond.description: Peak requests per second reached during this day

avgRequestsPerSecond.description: Average requests per second for this day

rejectedRequests.description: Number of requests rejected due to rate limiting

DailyUsageStatisticsResponse.description: Daily usage statistics for an environment
